system.description: This spell functions like eagle's splendor, except that it affects multiple creatures. Each target gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma and the usual benefits to Charisma-based skills and spell DCs.

components.materialDescription: A few feathers or a pinch of droppings from an eagle (arcane); divine focus (divine).

system.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
